Find Children Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System

Right-click a class in the Project Explorer window and select Find»Children from the shortcut menu to display this dialog box.

Use this dialog box to find all children of a specific class in the project.

This dialog box includes the following components:

  • List of children—Lists all children found in the project for the class.

If the item only has one child, LabVIEW highlights the child in the Project Explorer window.

You also can use the Find:Children property to find children programmatically.
